fileId.description: the id of the file generated

url.description: the url for downloading the file

efcms.description: the status of main dynamo table

efcmsDeploy.description: the status of deploy dynamo table

dynamsoft.description: the status of static hosted dynamsoft files

appFailover.description: the status of app failover bucket

eastDocuments.description: the status of east documents bucket

eastTempDocuments.description: the status of east temp documents bucket

eastQuarantine.description: the status of east quarantine bucket

public.description: the status of public ui bucket

publicFailover.description: the status of public failover ui bucket

westDocuments.description: the status of west documents bucket

westTempDocuments.description: the status of west temp documents bucket

westQuarantine.description: the status of west quarantine bucket

documentContents.description: plain text with line breaks for a an associated docket-entry's document contents

richText.description: rich text with line breaks for a an associated docket-entry's document contents

documentContents.description: a document contents response with both plain and rich-text

filedBy.description: the user name who filed the docket entry

userId.description: id of user who created the docket entry

status.description: the status of the docket entry

unprocessableEntityError.description: a unprocessable entity error (422), due to a problem in the body or the id in the url

assigneeName.description: the name of the user currently assigned the work item

messages.description: array of messages associated with the workitem

assigneeId.description: id of user currently assigned the work item

sentBy.description: the user or system function that generate or sent this original work item

docketEntries.description: array of rawDocketEntry ids and types associated with the case

respondent.description: the respondent who is associated with the case

userId.description: id of user who created the case

docketNumber.description: the unique docket number associated with the case

maxCases.description: max number of cases on the session

sort.description: field to sort the cases by

caseMetadata.description: map of cases to trial statuses

filters.description: trial status filters with boolean values

userId.description: id of the user who owns the note

primaryIssue.description: the primary issue noted for the case in Submitted/CAV status to which the worksheet belongs

finalBriefDueDate.description: the date the final briefs are due for the case to which the worksheet belongs

entityName.description: the name of the entity - CaseWorksheet

attachments.description: array of document metadata objects attached to the message

caseTitle.description: case title for the associated cases

completedAt.description: when the message was marked as completed

completedBy.description: the name of the user who completed the message thread

completedBySection.description: the section of the user who completed the message thread

completedByUserId.description: the ID of the user who completed the message thread

completedMessage.description: the message entered when completing the message thread

docketNumber.description: docket number of the associated case

docketNumberWithSuffix.description: docket number of the associated case with its suffix

entityName.description: the name of the entity - Message

from.description: the name of the user who sent the message

fromSection.description: the section of the user who sent the message

fromUserId.description: the ID of the user who sent the message

isCompleted.description: whether the message thread has been completed

isRepliedTo.description: whether the message has been replied to or forwarded

messageId.description: the unique ID generated by the system to represent the message

parentMessageId.description: the unique ID generated by the system to represent the parent / initial message

subject.description: the subject line of the message

to.description: the name of the user who is the recipient of the message

toSection.description: the section of the user who is the recipient of the message

toUserId.description: the ID of the user who is the recipient of the message

addToCoversheet.description: if the docket entry was added to the coversheet

createdAt.description: the date the docket entry was created

docketEntryId.description: the docket entry id to identify the docket entry

docketNumber.description: the docket number the docket entry belongs to

documentTitle.description: the title of the docket entry

draftOrderState.description: keeps track of the text written inside the draft order

eventCode.description: the event code type of entity

filingDate.description: the date the docket entry was filed

index.description: the position in the docket record

isDraft.description: used to know if the docket entry is a draft

isFileAttached.description: used to know if a file is attached to the docket entry

isMinuteEntry.description: used to know if the docket entry is a minute entry

isOnDocketRecord.description: used to know if the docket entry is on the docket record

isSealed.description: used to know if the docket entry has been sealed

isStricken.description: used to know if the docket entry has been stricken

pending.description: used to know if the docket entry is pending

processingStatus.description: keeps track of the processing state of the docket entry

receivedAt.description: the date the docket entry was received

sealedTo.description: who the docket entry is sealed to

servedAt.description: when the docket entry was served

signedAt.description: when the docket entry was signed

signedJudgeName.description: the name of the judge who signed the docket entry

userId.description: the userId of who created the docket entry

categoryName.description: the name of the document category type, appended with location if applicable

description.description: a description of the uploaded document

location.description: the location where the Cerificate of Good Standing was issued, if Certificate of G.S. was selected

fileName.description: the file name of the document

practitionerDocumentFileId.description: the auto-generated ID of the uploaded file

uploadDate.description: date when the document was uploaded
